channel.title: Cracking the Code on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Cracking the Code on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Hackers Went Looking for a Backdoor in High-Security Safes—and Now Can Open Them in Seconds
item.description: Security researchers found two techniques to crack at least eight brands of electronic safes—used to secure everything from guns to narcotics—that are sold with Securam Prologic locks.
